pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Subtle is a another tiling window manager with a very flexible and dynamical layout, client and view tagging, mouse and keyboard control as well as an extendable statusbar.
Subtler (subtle remote) is similar to wmctrl a commandline tool to interact with a EWMH/NetWM compatible window manager.
Sublets (subtle applets) are small programs written in Ruby to add features to the statusbar.
Subtlext (subtle extension) is a Ruby extension that brings the features of subtler to Ruby scripts.
